title: Person Of Interest Soundtrack: 4x21 Irrelevant
author: FringeMusic107
comment: Djawadi nailed the 60 seconds countdown music. Epic!
Thank you I have rewatched the episode yesterday and I was searching the epic Samaritan's countdown music. Such a shame it was not on the original soundtrack released.
I'm assuming that the Samaritan's animation sounds that plays besides the music at the end are on the left and right channels and you can't remove it am I right?
I RECOGNIZE THAT FONT! THAT'S CALL ONE REGULAR!!!!
description: Quite possibly the best POI soundtrack since... Well, season 1. This is the "Listening With A Million Ears" version of the Samaritan theme we've all been waiting for (3:27). It's so epic, it even has a choir. Taken from episode 4x21 "Asylum", composed by Ramin Djawadi.
